title: Picking your summon in game play at the start  of the match
body: i getting sick of people that can't pick there lanes or read what people have put down at the start of the match ...they do whatever please them selfs and people wanna fight  in a 10 sec pick at the start of the game ..a team should be able to work things out not putting players down in the match then you loose and the other team lol @ your team  its become real toxic

replies.body: Why i play ranked. Normals calls are a eecioy for toxic behaviour.
